value.halfverse: how long will you hide your face from me?
value.verse:
How long, O LORD?
will you forget me for ever? *

value.halfverse: how long shall my enemy triumph over me?
value.verse:
How long shall I have perplexity in my mind,
and grief in my heart, day after day? *
Look upon me and answer me, O LORD my God; *
value.halfverse: give light to my eyes, lest I sleep in death;
and my foes rejoice that I have fallen.
value.verse: Lest my enemy say, “I have prevailed over him,” *
But I put my trust in your mercy; *
value.halfverse: my heart is joyful because of your saving help.
I will praise the Name of the Lord Most High.
value.verse: I will sing to the LORD, for he has dealt with me richly; *
